com.es2.decorator

Interface AuthInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Auth, CommonWordsValidator, Decorator, Logging

    public interface AuthInterface
    Defines the common interface implemented by the Auth classes and all decorators classes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void auth(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Performs authentication.

    • Method Detail

      • auth

        void auth(java.lang.String username,
          java.lang.String password)
   throws AuthException,
          java.io.IOException
        Performs authentication. By default the username/password is admin/admin.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        Throws:
        AuthException - thrown when authentication fails
        java.io.IOException - thrown when some I/O error occurs
